body:
Comment 3: 
i think it's a IE-specific problem:
although the w3c standard says the id attribute is case-sensitive, IE deliberately treats
it as case-insensitive, this has bitten me several times.

the best thing we can do is to rename the id attribute of the <h2>Index</h2>,
or mangle the id attribute for all functions.
(or just leave as is, this is not a big deal, IMO)
